description:
The Google Gemini app is an AI assistant that can help supercharge your creativity and productivity.

This official app is free. Gemini gives you direct access to Google’s best family of AI models on your phone so you can:

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
- Generate images on the fly
- Get help with writing, learning, and more
- Summarize and find quick info from Gmail or Google Drive
- Make plans with Google Maps and Google Flights
- Use text, voice, photos and your camera to get help in new ways

Access Gemini Advanced right from your Gemini app.

Image Generation results for illustrative purposes and may vary. Internet connection and subscription for certain features required. Language and country availability varies. Create responsibly:
https://policies.google.com/terms/generative-ai/use-policy

The Gemini app is now live in English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and more languages. See the full list of supported languages and countries here:
https://support.google.com/?p=gemini_app_requirements_android

If you opt in to the Gemini app, it will replace your Google Assistant as the primary assistant on the phone. Some Google Assistant voice features aren't available through the Gemini app yet — including controlling media and routines. You can switch back to Google Assistant in settings.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
https://support.google.com/gemini?p=privacy_notice
summary: Chat with Gemini to supercharge your ideas

reviews.review: Why do we have to choose between Gemini or Assistant? They aren't comparable! Assistant is much more functional than Gem, but it doesn't have conversation skills like Gem. At home I enjoy live conversations, but I need access to "Interpreter Mode" for live translation when I'm at work – Gem can't do that. So everyday when I go to work I have to switch back to Assistant. If Gem had the same skills, I wouldn't need to keep switching. Gem is cool, but it's not a replacement for Assistant.

reviews.review: The high volume of live voice chats poses a significant challenge. Users are unable to adjust the volume settings, which can lead to discomfort during conversations. Additionally, the user interface (UI) for live chats is lacking in functionality. Currently, users are unable to see the text on-screen while engaged in voice chats, which necessitates exiting the live chat mode to access the text. This situation is not only inconvenient but also interrupts the flow of conversation and experience.

Google's Gemini AI needs some improvements, especially when compared to ChatGPT. While ChatGPT offers more human-like and accurate responses, Gemini AI can enhance its natural language processing, particularly in understanding context and language diversity. ChatGPT's user interface is also more intuitive and user-friendly, whereas Gemini AI could be made smoother for users. Additionally, Gemini AI should improve data security and customization options to better meet diverse user needs. Overall,

Gemini has potential, but its short-term memory really holds it back. It forgets everything from previous interactions, making it frustrating to have to re-explain the same things over and over. If you're looking for deeper, more engaging dialogues, there are better alternatives out there.
